# Areas {.unnumbered}

```{r setup}
#| include: false
rm(list = ls()) ; invisible(gc()) ; set.seed(42)
library(tidyverse)
library(terra)
library(sf)
library(leaflet)
theme_set(bayesplot::theme_default())
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = F, message = F, warning = F, fig.height = 6, fig.width = 8,
  cache = T, cache.lazy = F)
```

```{r data}
#| include: false
capricho <- st_read("data/capricho/capricho.shp")
guaviare <- st_read("data/guaviare/guaviare.shp")
```

```{r plotnc}
leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>%
  addPolygons(data = guaviare) %>% 
  addPolygons(data = capricho, col = "red")
```
